title: Mat Promet eShop
description: Built a comprehensive e-commerce platform using Next.js to digitize and expand the company's market reach. Implemented server-side rendering for optimal SEO performance and developed order tracking by using a mailing system. Increased online sales by 40% and streamlined order processing workflows.

title: Easy Testimonials
description: Built a dynamic web application to allow businesses to easily generate and customize professional-looking client testimonials. Implemented a user-friendly interface for rapid styling and a responsive design. Successfully developed a reusable component architecture to accelerate future feature development and significantly streamlined the process of collecting and displaying social proof.

title: Build Beacon
description: This platform is being developed to directly address the pervasive visibility and engagement challenges faced by indie developers on crowded social media spaces, particularly platforms like X (formerly Twitter). The goal is to move beyond short-lived posts by providing a structured, dedicated environment where creators can showcase the full, transparent journey of their projects, fostering deeper connections with genuine followers.
